Text:
Last week I was thinking it would be a good idea to have the OED on my Kindle and here it is.  Amazing what you're doing.
Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Hi, I can help buy Kindle ebooks, only $5 a book! Please email me if you're interested. Lynn_w98 at live dot com.

Dear Uploader,
first of all, thank you for all of your great torrent.
For this torrent (oxford dictionary), I try to use my calibre to convert it into .epub format, because I'll do it for my friend, who is blind. He prefer to use it in .EPUB format, but my calibre can't convert it. If you have time, please upload this dictionary in other formats, such as epub.
Thank you
I also found that Calibre failed to convert to epub
